A: Educate your communities & House reps. e.g. Write op-eds & letters to editors, screen #immigration videos & use online media #AskMenendez

A:Yes, immigrants in registered provisional immigrant status would be permitted to travel abroad for up to 180 days #AskMenendez

A:Yes, our bill strengthens border security & helps prevent crime. $3-6bil for better tech on the border, fencing & security #AskMenendez

A: There's a simpler process for #DREAMers who received Deferred Action for Childhood Arrivals (DACA), not auto- legalization. #AskMenendez
Q:Will ppl w/already-approved work permits from the recent DACA prgm be automatically legalized?–Raquel from Oklahoma City #AskMenendez

A:If you've had TPS (or other temp status) for 10yrs+, you'd be immediately eligible for a green card & 3yrs later-citizenship. #AskMenendez

A:We give DHS case-by-case discretion 4 torn apart fams & help stop states from ending parental rights based on parents' status #AskMenendez
